teams.name: Dreamwidth (DW)
teams.description: Members of the social media website Dreamwidth

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: TAO
teams.loan_because: we like to spread the flow of comprehensive energy and spirit
teams.description: Team for everybody who is looking for a serene style to practice fundamental but individual principles of Taoism in daily life. Welcome!

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27)

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
www.gerv.net/info/christian-field-partners
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about the suffering of human beings.
teams.description:

teams.name: Agile Coaches Transform the World
teams.loan_because: We have been blessed to work in jobs that allow us to transform our world and wish to share with others to grow their own businesses.
teams.description: We work in the business and non-profit world to transform the world of work as agile coaches. We help organizations achieve greater business value in a sustainable way that respects worker's contributions and organizational resources.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !

teams.name: Seeds
teams.loan_because: We are very passionate about serving the global community
teams.description: Ambitious college students venturing to make a positive impact.
